About.about: Committed to setting standards in the production of high-quality hygiene and cleaning products, with a foundation rooted in innovation, serving various sectors and ensuring a healthy and safe environment for all.
About.missionText: To provide innovative hygiene and cleaning solutions that exceed our customers' expectations at affordable prices.
About.visionText: We aspire to continuously evolve and be recognized as the leading supplier of hygiene and cleaning products in Angola and surroundings.
About.valuesText: Excellence and Quality: Producing products of the highest standard, exploring new trends and technologies, with products that contribute to a healthier planet.
About.missionQuestion: The company's reason for being. Why do we exist?
About.visionQuestion: Where do we want to go?

Products.title: Our Products
Products.description: We offer a range of products that affirm quality at affordable prices. Explore our catalogue and elevate your retail offerings.
Products.diaperDescription: All the comfort your baby needs from the early days of life with the Mimo, Noddy, Naval and Kido diapers. Diapers that fit the body, do not irritate the skin and have long absorption. All to make your baby's skin 100% more protected!
Products.soapDescription: A new line of Mossi Soaps is tested dermatologically and promotes exceptional care for your skin.
Products.washingSoapDescription: The line of bar soap from Higitec comes with exclusive benefits in each version, from confidence to Topic, to meet all your needs during the home and clothing cleaning.

Production.title: Production
Production.soap: Of soap and soaps per hour

WorkWithUs.title: Join our team of professionals
WorkWithUs.description: At HIGITEC we believe that a cheerful and motivated environment is the foundation for a healthy and prosperous society. Join us on our journey towards excellence to build a cleaner and safer future together.

Contacts.description: Contact us and find out more about our products and how we can meet your needs and boost the success of your business to build a cleaner and safer future together.
